title: Lag without ms or ping spikes
body: The last couple of days I've randomly lost control of my character as if I'm suffering from lag spikes, but everything else in-game runs smoothly. I cannot attack or move, but everything else seems to be working fine. My ms sits at 34 throughout this, and I've even attempted to reconnect once.

replies.body:
Ahhhh that sounds exactly like what happens when your network is dealing with packet loss. Packet loss happens after your connection leaves your network but before it ever hits our servers so it can be rather hard to deal with. Let's check for packet loss before jumping to any conclusions though. 

Grab the network logs from one of those games and have our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) scan it. Take a screenshot to post here so that I can take a look myself!
